{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Mojo Networks |model=C-100 |price=795 |fcc_date=12/20/2016 |is_manuf=No |manuf=Lite-On |manuf_model=WP8331 |type=access point |fcc_id=PPQ-WP8331 |ic_id=4491A-WP8331 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4028 |cpu1_cspeed=717 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=64 |ram1=256 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4028 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4028 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=Bluetooth 4.0 Chip;CSR (Qualcomm);CSR8510;;1; |flags=MU-MIMO, Wave2, PoE, DFS, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui=88:B1:E1 |oui_eth=88:B1:E1 }}
:• '''867''' Mbps max PHY rate per each 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• '''300''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Indoor Dual Radio 2x2:2 MU-MIMO 802.11ac Wave 2 Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.mojonetworks.com/products/wifi-access-points/14-products/wireless}}{{SupportPage|}}[https://www.mojonetworks.com/resource-pdfs/476/mojo-c-100-datasheet-42517.pdf Datasheet] Also known as ''[[Lite-On]] WP8331'', ''WatchGuard AP220'', ''WatchGuard C-100''. Optional CSR8510 bluetooth 4.0 may be present. DFS support added with a [https://fccid.io/PPQ-WP8331/Letter/C2PC-Letter-3448663 C2PC request on 08/11/2017].
